thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ING Further Acquires Of Majority Stake In Payvision

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ING Further Acquires Of Majority Stake In Payvision
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - ING GROEP NV:
* ING FURTHER INVESTS IN PAYMENTS BUSINESS WITH ACQUISITION OF MAJORITY STAKE IN PAYVISION
* REACHES AN AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE A 75% STAKE IN PAYVISION * PAYVISION HAS TOTAL VALUE OF EUR 360 MILLION * ‍AFTER COMPLETION OF TRANSACTION, PAYVISION‘S FOUNDING MANAGEMENT TEAM WILL HOLD A 25% MINORITY STAKE AND WILL CONTINUE TO LEAD COMPANY​
* ‍TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE IN Q1 OF 2018​ * ‍TRANSACTION IS NOT EXPECTED TO HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON ING‘S CET 1 RATIO ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
